short_des: Butter Chicken is a creamy, tomato-based Indian dish with marinated chicken, infused with spices, and finished with butter and cream, usually served with rice or naan bread.
Palak Paneer is a flavorful vegetarian Indian dish made with paneer (cottage cheese) and spinach sauce, often finished with cream and served with rice or naan bread.
Chana Masala is a vegetarian Indian dish made with chickpeas cooked in a tomato-based sauce with a blend of spices, often served with rice or bread.
